item.description:
Slow is fine, but I have a NEED FOR SPEED! Let's kick up the pace to around 16 mph (we usually average around 11-12). If you'd like to go slower, that's fine, but I'm going to try to keep up the pace. After all, we'll need to burn off all of that Halloween candy, right?

We'll tentatively meet this Sunday at 11:00AM on a trip from Providence on the East Bay Bikepath.

WE WILL BE STARTING ON THE PROVIDENCE SIDE at the parking lot near the Vets Memorial at Scenic Overlook just north of the address listed. Here's a Map of the location.

This will be a bike path ride - there are only a few places where we cross streets, so it's very safe.

The East Bay bike path is 14.5 miles of paved bike path from Providence to Bristol. It's pretty flat except for a hill or two at the Providence side.

PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE remember to take my cell phone number: 401-699-7304 in case you can't find us. As usual, I will be sporting my signature red road bike. I drive a red car.

Note: This is a tentative event!
item.how_to_find_us: I have a red bike, also I have a cell: 401-699-7304
item.name: Tentative: Biking East Bay (FASTER pace)
